review: Dr Priti is an excellent doctor - she is extremely thorough and rigorous with her work. She is very detail oriented and caught a very important aspect around the baby's position that hadn't been caught in 5 earlier sonography across 3 cities. She even shared a hand-drawn diagram along with the reports and did a subsequent call with my gynaecologist to explain the exact issue which ensured a very smooth delivery for us. This shows how much she cares for her patients. Lack of this critical information could have made the delivery very difficult for us - we were blessed to have met her at the right time!

My wife had visited the hospital and it was pregnancy related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was waiting time in the hospital. It was for 30 minutes. Scanning was done. Doctor was friendly.

I had been to hospital and it was for health issue. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I went to take 3D ultra sound and she was radiologist. There was waiting time when we went. It was for one hour. She was part of fertility department.

I had visited the hospital and it was gynaecology related. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was more waiting time when we went.  It was for 3 hours. Scanning was done. Hospitality was good.

I booked the appointment for myself as I wanted to  get a pregnancy scan the doctor is amazing  I can say she is too good with her work I am very satisfied with her consultation would surely recommend others

the consultation was for myself it was a 3D scan *** ** *** **** ****** I can say the experience was just amazing I am totally satisfied with the consultation I would surely recommend the doctor to others

I had visited for gynaecology related so went to hospital. ********* *** **** ** *** ******* I went for scanning. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. There was more waiting time in the hospital. I had waited for 5 hours. I met doctor and she was good. Staff were very cooperative.
